description:
CloudBerry Drive mounts your Azure and/or Amazon S3 account as a network or external drive to your Windows computer.
			If this package isn't up-to-date for some days, please [create an issue](https://github.com/RalfEs73/chocolatey-packages/issues/new/choose).
summary: Mounts your Azure and/or Amazon S3 Storage
author: MSP360
